mention.text: Human rights violations have escalated in eastern Ukraine and serious problems are emerging in Crimea , United Nations monitors said in a report released on Friday
the Organization for Security and Cooperation
Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
Europe , whose experts had identified a significant number of serious human rights violations during a visit to Ukraine in March
Those with influence on the armed groups responsible for much of the violence in eastern Ukraine -LRB- must -RRB-
the second by the UN monitoring mission
German Chancellor Angela Merkel 's spokesman Steffen Seibert
the U.N. human rights office 's Americas
